channel.title: Client.Java
channel.description: I need help with my server, whenever I try to open client.java to edit my server the batch file just pops up then closes really fast. What's wrong with it? And to keep the edited changes do I have to go to compile?

item.title: Client.Java
item.dc:creator: @vic_08 Vic_
item.description:
@vic_08 wrote:

ok…? WHAT?

client.java is a notepad… not a batch file. Click the notepad the says ’ CLIENT ’ not the batchfile that says ’ RUNSERVER ’

Read full topic
